學術基礎理論去 facebook 搵無名博士
佢個page有講

喺現階段黎講，shock absorption 比防撞更重要
因為海棉彈打中頭，外殼夠硬當然重要（12492/14052/1385 計埋距離應該夠頂射到埋黎既焦耳），但衝擊力點樣分散更緊要，
所謂既 less lethal 就係唔打穿你，但打到你五撈七傷，換句話就係唔要你直接見血，但打到你瘀黑內出血

頭盔唔係打唔爆就代表佢保護到你，你戴個不鏽鋼煲喺頭個煲都打唔爆，咁你係咪應該戴個煲出街？
頭盔除咗表面硬殼之外仲要配合deformation 嘅物料，吸震，固定，延長撞擊時間
F=m(fv-iv)/time 撞擊時間越長，撞擊力就越低，所以頭盔本身就希望佢受強烈撞擊時凹，甚至裂開去緩衝撞擊時間
如果得個硬字打唔爆就得嘅，鋼盔今時今日就唔會被淘汰，自己睇下幾多文獻記載戴鋼盔嘅士兵中彈之後因爲個頭盔唔識變型緩衝撞擊力而導致所有撞擊力傳到條頸到斷勁死
頭盔本身就係以抵擋單次撞擊作設計基礎去平衡物料重量同保護性，要打唔爆咁低層次嘅保護人人都可以頂住個10kg實心鉛塊

CE EN 1385 WARNING
No helmet can protect the wearer against all possible impacts. The helmet is designed to
be retained by a strap under the lower jaw. To be effective, a helmet must fit and be worn correctly. To check for correct fit, place helmet on head and make any adjustments indicated. Securely fasten retention system. Grasp the helmet and try to rotate it to the front and rear.
A correctly fitted helmet should be comfortable and should not move forward to obscure vision or backward to expose the forehead. Store in a cool, dry place. No attachments should be made to the helmet; do not modify this helmet in any way. The helmet is designed to absorb shock by partial destruction of the shell and liner. This damage may not be visible. Therefore, if subjected to a severe blow, the helmet should be destroyed and replaced, even if it appears undamaged. The helmet may be damaged and rendered ineffective by petroleum and petroleum products, cleaning agents, chemicals, paints, adhesives and other solvents, without the damage being visible to the user. A helmet has a limited lifespan in use and should be replaced when it shows obvious signs of wear. This helmet should remain in manufacturer packaging until the point of consumer purchase. This helmet should not be used by children while climbing or doing other activities where there is a risk of hanging or strangulation if
the child gets trapped while wearing the helmet. This helmet is not designed for other sports or motor vehicle use.

頭盔唔係打唔爆就代表佢保護到你，你戴個不鏽鋼煲喺頭個煲都打唔爆，咁你係咪應該戴個煲出街？
頭盔除咗表面硬殼之外仲要配合deformation 嘅物料，吸震，固定，延長撞擊時間
F=m(fv-iv)/time 撞擊時間越長，撞擊力就越低，所以頭盔本身就希望佢受強烈撞擊時凹，甚至裂開去緩衝撞擊時間
如果得個硬字打唔爆就得嘅，鋼盔今時今日就唔會被淘汰，自己睇下幾多文獻記載戴鋼盔嘅士兵中彈之後因爲個頭盔唔識變型緩衝撞擊力而導致所有撞擊力傳到條頸到斷勁死
頭盔本身就係以抵擋單次撞擊作設計基礎去平衡物料重量同保護性，要打唔爆咁低層次嘅保護人人都可以頂住個10kg實心鉛塊

因為海棉彈打中頭，外殼夠硬當然重要（12492/14052/1385 計埋距離應該夠頂射到埋黎既焦耳），但衝擊力點樣分散更緊要，
所謂既 less lethal 就係唔打穿你，但打到你五撈七傷，換句話就係唔要你直接見血，但打到你瘀黑內出血

單車頭盔會貼頭 有硬物撞擊會將個力卸落你個頭到 係痛啲既
而安全帽入面會有緩衝空間 硬物撞擊會有空間卸力 個頭無咁傷

而單車頭盔無咁易爆 相對可以承受多次撞擊

單車頭盔既話 要搵無乜洞既款式

不同意！厚料ABS的話狅打都打唔爆！因為我試驗過

頭盔唔係打唔爆就代表佢保護到你，你戴個不鏽鋼煲喺頭個煲都打唔爆，咁你係咪應該戴個煲出街？
頭盔除咗表面硬殼之外仲要配合deformation 嘅物料，吸震，固定，延長撞擊時間
F=m(fv-iv)/time 撞擊時間越長，撞擊力就越低，所以頭盔本身就希望佢受強烈撞擊時凹，甚至裂開去緩衝撞擊時間
如果得個硬字打唔爆就得嘅，鋼盔今時今日就唔會被淘汰，自己睇下幾多文獻記載戴鋼盔嘅士兵中彈之後因爲個頭盔唔識變型緩衝撞擊力而導致所有撞擊力傳到條頸到斷勁死
頭盔本身就係以抵擋單次撞擊作設計基礎去平衡物料重量同保護性，要打唔爆咁低層次嘅保護人人都可以頂住個10kg實心鉛塊

CE EN 1385 WARNING
No helmet can protect the wearer against all possible impacts. The helmet is designed to
be retained by a strap under the lower jaw. To be effective, a helmet must fit and be worn correctly. To check for correct fit, place helmet on head and make any adjustments indicated. Securely fasten retention system. Grasp the helmet and try to rotate it to the front and rear.
A correctly fitted helmet should be comfortable and should not move forward to obscure vision or backward to expose the forehead. Store in a cool, dry place. No attachments should be made to the helmet; do not modify this helmet in any way. The helmet is designed to absorb shock by partial destruction of the shell and liner. This damage may not be visible. Therefore, if subjected to a severe blow, the helmet should be destroyed and replaced, even if it appears undamaged. The helmet may be damaged and rendered ineffective by petroleum and petroleum products, cleaning agents, chemicals, paints, adhesives and other solvents, without the damage being visible to the user. A helmet has a limited lifespan in use and should be replaced when it shows obvious signs of wear. This helmet should remain in manufacturer packaging until the point of consumer purchase. This helmet should not be used by children while climbing or doing other activities where there is a risk of hanging or strangulation if
the child gets trapped while wearing the helmet. This helmet is not designed for other sports or motor vehicle use.

如果得個硬字打唔爆就得嘅，鋼盔今時今日就唔會被淘汰，自己睇下幾多文獻記載戴鋼盔嘅士兵中彈之後因爲個頭盔唔識變型緩衝撞擊力而導致所有撞擊力傳到條頸到斷勁死
頭盔本身就係以抵擋單次撞擊作設計基礎去平衡物料重量同保護性，要打唔爆咁低層次嘅保護人人都可以頂住個10kg實心鉛塊

CE EN 1385 WARNING
No helmet can protect the wearer against all possible impacts. The helmet is designed to
be retained by a strap under the lower jaw. To be effective, a helmet must fit and be worn correctly. To check for correct fit, place helmet on head and make any adjustments indicated. Securely fasten retention system. Grasp the helmet and try to rotate it to the front and rear.
A correctly fitted helmet should be comfortable and should not move forward to obscure vision or backward to expose the forehead. Store in a cool, dry place. No attachments should be made to the helmet; do not modify this helmet in any way. The helmet is designed to absorb shock by partial destruction of the shell and liner. This damage may not be visible. Therefore, if subjected to a severe blow, the helmet should be destroyed and replaced, even if it appears undamaged. The helmet may be damaged and rendered ineffective by petroleum and petroleum products, cleaning agents, chemicals, paints, adhesives and other solvents, without the damage being visible to the user. A helmet has a limited lifespan in use and should be replaced when it shows obvious signs of wear. This helmet should remain in manufacturer packaging until the point of consumer purchase. This helmet should not be used by children while climbing or doing other activities where there is a risk of hanging or strangulation if
the child gets trapped while wearing the helmet. This helmet is not designed for other sports or motor vehicle use.

有朋友對頭盔可抵檔既焦耳數，根據個SPEC做左個粗略估算

EN397既只可抵檔29J

728呢啲頭盔就係就機會比子彈(布袋/橡膠/海棉/催淚)射中所以搞成咁
本人實測試過，用伸縮棍無論打幾大力都唔會打得爆個頭盔
但係地盤頭盔仍然有機會抗擋到呢類型既防暴子彈(取決於距離, 距離越遠焦耳數遞減)

而EN12492 或 EN14052 就可以比較有效抵檔防暴子彈
只要買到個SPEC係呢兩個型號，個防禦力都係差唔多
當然價錢有平有貴，但係如果需要棄裝既話都係買隻平既好D

另外你知依家D死黑警專瞄頭射...
對眼睛好啲
平時大家用既普通眼罩只係EN166 Class F - 0.87J
可以既話真係要買貴少少，以下有幾種SPEC既參考
